pressentertostart.message: Press enter to start this command:

welcome.message: Hello, my Name is Molly. I will help you to find the things you want to find. I will help you. Only type what you want into the search bar, or click on the mic and tell me what's on your mind. Type "help" to see what you can ask me. Have fun!

thousandtimesused.message: Hello, this is Molly again. Just wanted to say, you have used me 1000 Times! Yes this is a lot. But another important thing. My developer need a lot of time to make me as good as I am. Time to give something back to him!

headline1.message: Hey {name}! What's on your mind today?

headline2.message: Hey {name}! What do you care about?

nocardsfornotification.message: You've selected no cards for notifications

dropcardstoremove.message: Drop Cards here if you aren't interested anymore.!

nocardstoshowincardslider.message: Sie haben keine Karten ausgewählt, an denen Sie dauerhaft interessiert sind. Sie können das tun, nachdem Sie ein Command eingegeben haben, und anschließend auf "Interesse an dieser Info?" klicken!

alreadyonlist.message: Dieser Command ist schon auf deiner Watchlist!

putonwatchlist.message: Are you interested in this command?

youalreadygetnotif.message: You already get notifications for this card

getnotifforthis.message: Do you want notifications for this card?

cantviewwithoutpermission.message: You can't view this card without this permission

dontscream.message: Sie müssen nicht schreien, Molly hört Sie!

startwithoutname.message: Ohne Namen fortfahren (kann später noch hinzugefügt werden)

minimalexplain.message: If you don't have the best internet/computer you can switch to this theme to make Software much faster (minimal design, minimal features (but main features will work!))

sprachausgabehilfe.message: Here you see all the commands you need using Molly.

morethanonecity.message: sorry there are more than one city. Please specify with country.

hererecentlyclosed.message: Here are your recently closed websites.

typetoadd.message: type "add", to add a new note!

keinalarm.message: Noch keinen Alarm hinzugefügt. "add" und anschließend die Minuten in denen er klingeln soll eingeben um das zutun

enteratime.message: Now enter a number (time the alarm should ring)

entervalidstream.message: Please enter a valid url from a rss stream.

helpnotifications.message: To add notifications, click on a card (which have the possiblitiy of notifications) on the add notification link at the bottom!

descriptionmail.message: view your mails or write a mail.

descriptionweather.message: view the weather for a city.

descriptionclock.message: View the time for a city.

descriptioninfo.message: get information about app,developer and support ways.
Information about your cpu and memory

descriptionrecently.message: view and launch recently closed pages.

descriptionninegag.message: get a good post from ninegag.

descriptionblog.message: search and subscribe your favorite blogs.

descriptionreddit.message: what is going on at reddit?

descriptionsuggest.message: suggest a feature to the developer!

descriptiongoogle.message: search in the world wide web.

klicktostart.message: Klicken Sie zum Starten auf eine freie Stelle auf dem Bildschirm.

startwithfirststep.message: Start Molly again with the first steps tutorial.

firststeps1.message: This is the Main Input. Type your question into it. For example "What's the Weather like". Type "help" to find out all the things you can ask Molly.

firststeps2.message: Here are your most visited websites. Just move the mouse in the left space to open this menu, and open a website.

firststeps3.message: You can click here to open a thing called cardslider. In this you find the information you are interested in. To add a card into the cardslider, click on the link below the information box you get after you enter a command in the input.

firststeps4.message: You have finished the "first-step" tutorial. There are many more things to discover. Go on and test!

newupdate.message: Eines neues Update von Molly ist erschienen, und wurde schon installiert. Sicherlich gibt es viele neue Funktionen! Probieren Sie's aus!

helprss.message: RSS Streams (z.B. News, Foren, etc) hinzufügen

msghelprss.message: RSS Streams (z.B. News, Foren, etc) hinzufügen
